column2: Difficulty getting motivated to achieve goals. May lack self-confidence to even set personal goals. General lack of enthusiasm, feeling overwhelmed by change.

Highly motivated with many goals and aspirations for the future. Vital and spontaneous, often enjoying the challenge of traveling down new and adventurous roads in life. Irrepressible enthusiasm. Weakness lies in tendency to exaggerate and inability to cope with more mundane activities in life.
Difficulty coping with the realities of everyday life. Practical daily chores seem beyond capabilities, with difficulty concentrating on matters at hand.

Practical and efficient, hands-on approach. Can be relied on to take a common-sense approach to most matters. Down-to-earth manner stands well for the daily chores of life. Weakness lies in sometimes stubborn refusal to make changes in life. Tendency to stifle both own and other people's enthusiasm.

Lack of objectivity - the ability to stand back and view aspects of life from a detached and rational perspective. Difficulty making decisions and in the process of weighing up the pros and cons in a logical manner.

Objective and philosophical, preferring to view life from an intellectual perspective. Rational mind will outweigh feelings every time, as the world of emotions is considered to be irrational. High sense of fairness, and a logical thought process. Weakness lies in the fact that emotions are viewed in a disparaging light.

Out of kilter with emotions. Crying or losing cool in front of other people would be a horrifying thought, let alone action. Often lack compassion for others in human relationships, and need to learn to honor both own and other people's feelings.

Speaking from the heart, compassionate and caring with a strong intuitional nature. Values personal relationships, often taking on a caretaker role. Such a sympathetic and understanding nature that often caught in the role of mother to loved ones. Weakness lies in the fact that fails to take an objective perspective when necessary. Often reacts without thinking things through first.
